text.tspan: What do you need a freelancer for?
e.g. Design of a beautiful marketing website
The more detailed you can be, the more likely you have of finding the right freelancers for
Select as many or a few as apply
This doesn't have to be exact and can be changed later.
The price is in GBP and excludes tax.
Where can the freelancer work from?
(Only selected freelancers will be shown the brief)
I’d like help shortlisting and selecting candidates.
